footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Traveler | Update Date: 10/21/2023 | Editor: ._.samantha._.

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Sword, Sacrificial Sword__
Traveler is a capable off field Dendro applier, however Traveler generates little energy for themselves, therefore weapons with an Energy Recharge substat is ideal to ensure that Traveler is capable of maintaining uptime on their Elemental Burst. Favonius Sword has the added benefit of being able to restore energy for the entire team

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Freedom Sworn, Iron Sting__
This weapon enhances Traveler's damage if used in a Spread team. Freedom Sworn has the added benefit of being able to buff the entire team as well.
__Fleuve Cendre Ferrymen__
Baseline for free options, with Energy Recharge and a buff for Energy Recharge.
__Wolf Fang__
Battle Pass weapon that's good for their personal damage.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or Elemental Mastery or ATK% |<goblet> Dendro DMG or Elemental Mastery or ATK% |<circlet> CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Substats Priority
fields.value: Energy Recharge(till requirements)|CRIT Rate|CRIT DMG|Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Surgent Manifestation
**2)** Elemental Skill: Razorgrass Blade
**N/A)**Normal Attack: Foreign Fieldcleaver

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Note: Traveler's Energy requirements vary a lot by team, use an energy recharge calculator to calculate Traveler's Energy requirements for your team.
